basics.name: Bob Argenbright
basics.label: Software Engineer :: Security Specialist
basics.summary: In a world intelligently designed, filled with creatures capable of conscious thought, there emerged puzzles, and questions. Some questions cannot be answered, and some puzzles cannot be solved, but for the rest, we have Engineers. - I am a Software Engineer - I speak fluent nerd; the language of programmers. I seek to solve the puzzles and challenges of the day, using machinery designed by other engineers. Together, we can solve many of the problems we face day-to-day, thanks to the gift of intelligence given to us by the Almighty. To Him be the glory.

work.summary: Heroku is a web services company owned by Salesforce
highlights: Build production systems for automated detection and mitigation of platform abuse
Research and document novel techniques for detecting abuse

work.summary: Danaher Corporation is a holdings company, providing a tested business model to it's operating companies.
highlights: Build automated methods for detection and response of cyber security incidents
Provide guidance on security policies and best practices
Perform analysis of threats detected and document the threat

work.summary: San Diego Gas & Electric is a subsidiary of Sempra Energy, providing utilities services to Southern California residents.
highlights: Implemented advanced malware detection & forensics systems [CarbonBlack, Bit9, Palo Alto Wildfire]
Investigated and remediated various network security incidents
Developed tools for automating the collection and digestion of incident related data

work.summary: Leidos is a corporation with divisions focused in Health, National Security, and Engineering.
highlights: Performed analysis of threat artifacts gathered by the Computer Incident Response Team
Correlated attack data with current threat actors and campaigns

work.summary: Level 3 provides network backbone infrastructure to internet service providers and managed services to enable secure and reliable communication.
highlights: Configured unified threat management systems per customer specification
Analyzed security events from IDS systems and network/endpoint logs

awards.title: Carbonblack Innovator
awards.summary: Customer who extended and utilized the platform to it's fullest extent
